__e: And you'll be hearing his name at your trial, because you hired him to commit one murder and then take the blame for another.
You want someone to commit a crime and blame it on someone else, he's your guy.
I watch them make mistakes, and you think these feelings that I'm lacking make them better?
You're making one mistake after another.
Listening to your mother is a mistake, Regina.
Uh, pardon me, sir, but... you're making a terrible mistake.
Don't make another mistake that might cost more lives.

On the contrary, I want you back in business... gives me an opportunity to keep my eye on you because one day you are going to make a mistake and on that day, you're going to lose more than your license!
Never make the mistake of forgetting that.
Is there still a place where I can commit suicide?
If we're now in a place where the machine is asking us to commit murder, that's a place I can't go.
I know all this because I have made every mistake a man can make.
I'd commit murder to go to college!
You tried to get him to commit another crime to cover it up, and now-- You said I should tell her what's really bothering me!
But just because you and I want the same thing doesn't mean that I'm willing to perjure myself to get it.
It's not like I ever wanted to commit suicide.
Well, just because he didn't fire it doesn't he didn't use it to commit a crime.
I was the only one that wanted to commit suicide that day.
